page.title: 18SHOPPING
page.content: {Doddinghurst News,}a family business was built in 1970 and sells 8,500 papers per week and uses 22 paper boys.Fresh vegetables and fruit can be bought from{Joans,}another family business. The produce is collected from a market in London by the owner who leaves home at 4.15am each morning. Some people do their{weekly shopping in the village, but many use Brentwood, Basildon, Romford and Chelmsford for their main shopping. A few people seem to go to London for special buys and most go to Romford for clothes, furniture and other household items.
